short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Injects a script into the DOM of pages containing 'netsuite.com'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide Customize View button in NetSuite for PMB NetSuite User.
Requested by PMB IT, developed by BlackOak Consulting @ 2024.

This extension is intentionally develop only for PressMetal use case.
Use at your own risk.
